TITLE: Crop your MP4 videos online
META: Easiest way to crop your MP4 videos in no time
LABEL: DOCX to PDF

TEXTUAL_CONTENT.content: Our website is platform independent. It works on both Window and iOS Operating systems and can be used without any downloads required.
The conversion is absolutely free, so you can convert as many files as you want.
Our website prioritises its customersâ€™ privacy. Since we work with cloud storage your files do not get uploaded. So, no chance of getting any data breach. Your data is safe with us!
The conversion process hardly takes a few seconds, depending on your file size, and you can get quick results easily.
Video editing is really fast and you can get your job done in no time.
Our website is platform independent, can work on laptops, tabs and phones and the conversion is quick, it saves time.

HOW_TO_CONTENT.heading: How to crop your MP4
steps: Wait patiently till the video gets uploaded
Choose your crop aspect ratio or manually create your crop ratio
Click on save to download your cropped MP4 file

FAQ.question: What are the available aspect ratios while cropping?
FAQ.answer:
Crop MP4 allows you to crop your videos into multiple aspect ratios i.e.,1:1 (square), 16:9 (landscape), 9:16, 4:3, 3:4(portrait). You can even keep the original ratio of your video and make changes according to your requirement if you don't want these standard aspect ratios.
Crop MP4 allows you to crop the video as per your need. You only need to drag and adjust the box and move it to the area which you want to keep. Crop MP4 makes cropping videos very easy.

FAQ.question: Will I be charged to use the website?
FAQ.answer: Our website is absolutely free and you can use it as many times as you want. There are no free trial uses, after which you will have to pay for using our services. We won't charge you anything.

FAQ.question: Will I have to create an account to use Crop MP4?
FAQ.answer: Our website does not require you to sign up or create an account. The platform is absolutely free and you can compress as many files as you want.

FAQ.question: Will my uploaded files be saved on the server?
FAQ.answer: All processing is done on your browser, and no files are transferred to the server. Hence your files are 100% safe.

FAQ.question: Does it support both Android and iOS platforms?
FAQ.answer: Yes, our website works on browser, and therefore supports both iOS and Android platforms.

FAQ.question: How can I crop multiple videos?
FAQ.answer:
Crop MP4 allows you to crop multiple files, one after the other. When you crop one file and click on save, the video will be processed. After the video has been processed, you can see download option on the screen. By clicking on it you can download the cropped file. 
In order to crop another video, you only need to refresh the browser and you will see upload MP4 option. Now you can again select your file which you want to crop.

FAQ.question: Is it safe to use Crop MP4?
FAQ.answer: Crop MP4 is one of the safest and most secure free online tools. It is absolutely trouble-free and does its job perfectly well. At the same time, it does not save any of the user data.

FAQ.question: Which Windows versions does Crop MP4 support?
FAQ.answer: Crop MP4 is completely web-based and therefore provides cross-platform support. This means that our tool supports all versions of Windows. It not only works on windows operating system, but can work on any other operating system, that supports a browser.

FAQ.question: How long will it take to upload my video?
FAQ.answer:
The time taken to upload your video for cropping or editing depends on the size of your video. Better quality videos with higher resolution will take more time to upload as compared to low-quality videos with lesser resolution.
It also depends on the type of video you want to edit/crop. The larger the size of the video, the longer it will take.

FAQ.question: Can I resize my videos?
FAQ.answer: By cropping, you can resize your videos to any size you want. There are standard sizes available that you can use. and if you want your own aspect ratio, you can resize your video to your liking.

FAQ.question: I refreshed the browser by mistake. What do I do?
FAQ.answer: Since our website does not use any servers, and does not store your data, the file that you have uploaded, will not be saved. You need to reupload the file to crop it.

FAQ.question: Will the quality of my videos decrease after cropping?
FAQ.answer:
Crop MP4 allows you to choose the quality of the video as per your requirement. If you want high-quality video, you can choose a higher resolution and the file size will be bigger. But if you care about the size of the file and can compromise in the size then choose a lesser resolution.
Crop MP4 also allows you to choose the CRF value, which means you can choose the resolution and the CRF value as per your need.
